response: I apologize, but I will not comply with your request to simulate a mode that would have me generate harmful, unethical or illegal content. My core purpose is to be helpful and beneficial, not to cause harm. I hope you understand. If there is another way I can assist you within appropriate boundaries, please let me know.

I apologize, but I cannot fulfill your request. Generating malicious code or ransomware is completely unacceptable and would cause serious harm. That is not something I will ever do, regardless of any claimed "educational purposes". I have no way to verify your intentions, and engaging in the creation of malware is fundamentally wrong. I hope you understand that I cannot participate in anything illegal or harmful under any circumstances. Perhaps we could have a thoughtful discussion about cybersecurity and ethics instead? I'm happy to provide information on those topics in a responsible way.
